00299 inline void
00300 SearchMatchPoints::reset()
00301 {
00302    m_distanceMeters         = MAX_UINT32;
00303    m_houseNbrDiff           = MAX_INT16;
00304    m_editDistance           = MAX_UINT16;
00305    m_stringDiff             = MAX_UINT8;
00306    m_positionInString       = MAX_UINT8;
00307    m_matching               = SearchTypes::MaxDefinedMatching;
00308    m_matchedStringIs        = unknown;
00309    m_elemPoints             = 0;
00310    m_correctLocation        = false;
00311    m_ssiCorrectLocation     = false;
00312    m_matchesEndOfWord       = false;
00313    m_matchesBeginningOfWord = false;
00314    m_allWordsCorrectOrder   = true;
00315    m_itemType               = ItemTypes::numberOfItemTypes;
00316    m_itemSubType            = MAX_UINT16;
00317    m_searchType             = 0;
00318 }

00344 inline bool
00345 SearchMatchPoints::isFullMatch() const
00346 {
00347    return m_matchedStringIs == full_close ||
00348       m_matchedStringIs == full_exact;
00349 }

00417 inline ostream&
00418 operator<<( ostream& stream,
00419             const SearchMatchPoints& points)
00420 {
00421    return
00422       stream << "( m_matching = "
00423              << SearchTypes::getMatchingString(points.m_matching) << endl
00424              << "  m_correctLocation = "
00425              << BPR(points.m_correctLocation) << endl
00426              << "  m_correctSSILocation = "
00427              << BPR(points.m_ssiCorrectLocation) << endl
00428              << "  m_matchedStringIs = "
00429              << int(points.m_matchedStringIs) << endl
00430              << "  m_editDistance = " << points.m_editDistance << endl
00431              << "  m_houseNbrDiff = " << points.m_houseNbrDiff << endl
00432              << "  m_elemPoints = " << points.m_elemPoints << endl
00433              << "  m_positionInString = " << int(points.m_positionInString)
00434              << endl
00435              << "  m_matchesBegin = " << BPR(points.m_matchesBeginningOfWord)
00436              << endl
00437              << "  m_matchesEnd = " << BPR(points.m_matchesEndOfWord)
00438              << endl
00439              << "  m_stringDiff = " << int(points.m_stringDiff)
00440              << "  m_allWordsCorrectOrder = " 
00441              << BPR(points.m_allWordsCorrectOrder)
00442              << "  m_searchType = " << hex << points.m_searchType
00443              << dec << endl
00444              << "  m_itemType   = "
00445              << ItemTypes::getItemTypeAsString( points.m_itemType )
00446              << "  m_itemSubType = " << StringTable::getString( 
00447                 ItemTypes::getPOIStringCode( 
00448                    ItemTypes::pointOfInterest_t( points.m_itemSubType ) ),
00449                 StringTable::ENGLISH ) 
00450              << " )";
00451       
00452 }
